thread.title: China welcomes 'old friend' Omar Bashir
thread.title_full: China welcomes 'old friend' Omar Bashir | News24

author: news24.com
title: China welcomes 'old friend' Omar Bashir
text:
Beijing - Chinese President Xi Jinping welcomed Sudan's President Omar Hassan al-Bashir, an accused war criminal, as an "old friend" on Tuesday, as China's foreign ministry defended his invite to a military parade to mark the end of WWII.
The Hague-based International Criminal Court (ICC) issued arrest warrants for al-Bashir in 2009 and 2010, accusing him of masterminding genocide and other atrocities in his campaign to crush a revolt in the western Darfur region.
Members of the ICC are obliged to act on arrest warrants, but China is not a member.
Meeting in Beijing's cavernous Great Hall of the People, Xi lauded the partnership between the two countries.
